main event: An unidentified projectile-shaped object was sighted near the Azores Islands on June 4, 1960.
interesting points: The object was observed for 4-5 seconds during evening twilight., The object appeared to be in level flight and disintegrated several times while descending., It left a trail of a white cloud-like substance., The sighting was confirmed by both the pilot and co-pilot of the aircraft., The report concluded that it was likely a balloon, though its description was similar to a meteor.
witness description: pilot and co-pilot of the aircraft
